law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Child support order" means:
any support order for a child issued by a tribunal; or
an executed affidavit of support.

"Party" means:
the legal parent of a child;
a caretaker with whom the child resides; or
the Administration when:
it has accepted an assignment of support under § 5-312(b)(2) of the Human Services Article; or
the child has been placed in the care and custody of the State.
"Tribunal" has the meaning stated in § 10-301(z) of this title.
